comment._content: President of the United Mine Workers: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Mitchell_%28United_Mine_Worker... There's a statue of him on the courthouse square in Scranton PA (my birthplace). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:John_Mitchell_statue_in_Scrant...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: He is likely photographed in New York City Hall (as were the following pictures of Ida Tarbell and Samule Untermyer) in connection with the Commission on Industrial Relations hearings, at which he eventually testified. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commission_on_Industrial_Relations
